Articles.Content:
So recently I have been developing stuff in Unity and while it's a great game engine, whenever I build my projects, it always has two things

1. The .exe

2. The <insertgamenamehere>win_data folder

However, KSP seems to not abide by these rules. Whats going on?

KSP loads external assets (parts, plugins, etc.) into the game. I'm not familiar with Unity, but Squad may have chosen to relocate the assets outside of the KSP_data folder simply so that it's easier to find when installing addons.
For a sec, I thought you were going to talk about the order of Kerbal rule, and hierarchy.
